title: Meditation break
text: Meditation break THE NATION September 25, 2015 1:00 am Thai Airways International's Royal Orchid Holidays is organising a Buddhist tour from October 21 to 25 to Colombo, Sri Lanka for customers interested in prayer, meditation, and sermons by Phra Maha Vudhijaya Vajiramedhi. AIRLINE Meditation break Thai Airways International's Royal Orchid Holidays is organising a Buddhist tour from October 21 to 25 to Colombo, Sri Lanka for customers interested in prayer, meditation, and sermons by Phra Maha Vudhijaya Vajiramedhi. This Buddhist meditation tour is open to 80 to 100 participants and will be conducted in the Thai language only. Tour prices for Economy Class is Bt51,600 (Twin Room), and Bt60,760 (Single Room) while Royal Silk Class per person is at Bt63,500 (Twin Room), and Bt72,660 (Single Room). A security deposit of Bt25,000 is required on booking. Prices include airport tax and fuel surcharge. Call the Royal Orchid Holidays Department on Monday to Friday between 8am to noon and 1 to 5pm at (02) 288-7335 or visit www.RoyalOrchidHolidays.com. BANGKOK Double delights A double dose of sensual delights awaits with the new Unwind Me Dine Me Japanese package at the Westin Grande Sukumvit Bangkok. For Bt2,000, you'll enjoy a spa treatment at Vareena Spa followed by a delectable detox bento box at Kisso Japanese Restaurant. Spend Bt2,000 for lunch at Kisso and receive a Bt500 cash voucher to save on a revitalising treatment on your next visit to Vareena Spa. Call (02) 207 8000 extension 8450 or e-mail: vareenainfo@yahoo.com. Visit www.WestinGrandeSukhumvit.com. Such a splash It's So Pool Party time at Sofitel So Bangkok. Spend the day at the most happening pool party of the season and also enjoy stunning views while indulging in delectable barbecue bites and delicious cocktails accompanied by dynamic beats and mixes by international DJs Ggag, Georges LG, Honey G and DJ Natsha Freake. This So Pool Party is this Saturday from 1 to 9pm. Entry is Bt400 including one drink and happy hour runs from 1 to 2pm. Call (02) 624 0000 or e-mail: h6835-fb3@sofitel.com. Like in a Dream Craft your fantasy honeymoon at Dream Hotel Bangkok. The hotel's Dream team offers a variety of exciting and amazing honeymoon amenities and services in a package that costs Bt7,900 and covers two nights in a Premier King Room, daily buffet breakfast at Flava Restaurant, one bottle of sparkling wine, flower spread over the bed and in bathroom, one candlelit dinner for two (Thai or Western set menu), welcome fruit basket and cake upon arrival, 10 per-cent discount on laundry, late check-out to 4pm and free Wi-Fi. The deal is available through December 31. Visit www.DreamHotels.com/bangkok and Facebook.com/Dreambkk. HUA HIN Romantic retreat Amari Hua Hin is offering Just the Two of Us package with romantic candle-lit dinners and many little extras that allow you to focus only on each other. The package is priced at Bt7,990 and includes two nights in Deluxe King room, welcome drink, one bottle of house wine, upgrade to the next Deluxe room category, one day ticket for the 4D Art Museum, coffee or tea and snacks at Coral Lounge and a special set dinner and one bottle of wine at Shoreline Beach Club. A minimum of two nights is required. Call (032) 616 600. Visit www.Amari.com/huahin. Tropical treat Experience one of Thailand's best beach destinations with the Hyatt Regency Hua Hin's new special offers. The Pay for Two, Stay for Three Nights package, which is valid from next Wednesday through December 19, allows you to book a minimum three nights stay and received third night free. The second one is Travel Industry package, which offers 50 per-cent discount on Hyatt Daily Rate as a gesture of appreciation to all working in travel agents, airlines and hospitality industry. Booking and staying period is valid through December 20. Identification and proof of travel industry employment is required upon check-in to receive special rates. Call (032) 521 234 or e-mail: huahin.regency@hyatt.com. Visit huahin.regency.hyatt.com. 4 Viewed
